name: AnneMechi
description:
Action adventure game made during GJL Game Parade

Where you must prepare during the day and upgrade your character to prepare for the final battle wish you luck adventurer.

HOW TO PLAY

[B] to recall to shop

[W,A,S,D] to move

[E] to pick up and interact

[left click ]to fire 

[right click] to aim

[space] to dodge  

Music was from Universal Production Music
